long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read websites in their original language and understand what's going on at the same time.

When you translate a website via the Google Translate button in the search bar, the translate paste extension displays the original text alongside the translation.

Though this might look a bit rough sometimes, you've now got subtitles for the web, so to speak.
